page.title: 08CAMBRIDGE SCIENCE PARK
page.content: THIS IS A JOINT ENTERPRISE BETWEEN TRINITY COLLEGE CAMBRIDGE AND HIGH TECH THE INDUSTRIES WHICH CONSISTS OF MANY SMALL FIRMS AND SOME NOT SO SMALL.ONE OF THE SMALLEST,{ (ARIES {COMPUTERS)},FOR INSTANCE,STARTED IN 1984 WITH 2 DIRECTORS AND 7 OTHER STAFF OCCUPIES 800sq.ft.ON THE SITE, DEVELOPING, PRODUCING AND MARKETING RESEARCH.ON THE OTHER HAND NAPP LABORTORIES LTD OCCUPYING 124,000sq.ft. ARE ENGAGED IN RESEACH, DEVELOPMENT, MANUFACTURING AND MARKETING OF ETHICAL PHARMACEUTICALS WITH 7 DIRECTORS AND 299 STAFF.THERE ARE 50 FIRMS ALTOGETHER.THEY EMPLOY OVER 1,700 PEOPLE INCLUDING 176 DIRECTORS,AND ABOUT 200 SENIOR MANAGERS AND STAFF.
